12 Tooltips

12.1 Static demo

Four options are available: top, right, bottom, and left aligned.

Default Tooltip
Error Message

12.2 Interactive demo

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-3"><button type="button" class="btn" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Tooltip on top">Tooltip on top</button></div>
<div class="col-md-3"><button type="button" class="btn" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="left" title="Tooltip on left">Tooltip on left</button></div>
<div class="col-md-3"><button type="button" class="btn" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="right" title="Tooltip on right"> Tooltip on right</button></div>
<div class="col-md-3"><button type="button" class="btn" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="bottom" title="Tooltip on bottom"> Tooltip on bottom</button></div>
